name: LAND HORROR
description:
Land Horror is the First Fps Games Made In NEPAL. You can experience different themes of Nepal and the main elements of this game reflecting Nepal is that, there will be Dharahara.And the game will be full of action and different themes of Nepal.

Players can enjoy different levels and different action and many more thing in this game and this is the first game of ATNIGHT GAMES. We cannot met the gamers all needs but we will try to make a action and super title game and Let's begin "HORROR IN THE LAND SOON".
